Contents.Content: select --病人基本信息 br.patient_id as VALUE,--病人编号 br.patient_id as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 br.name as NAME, --病人姓名 br.name as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.sex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.birth_date as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.age as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 --住院信息 zy.ward_name as WARDAREA,--病区 zy.bed_no as BEDNO --床位 from dbo.view_supply_patient_info br left join dbo.view_supply_zy_patient_info zy br.patient_id=zy.patient_id where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.patient_id as VALUE,--病人编号 br.name as NAME, --病人姓名 br.name as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.sex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.birth_date as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.age as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 ss.op_record_ID as MEDICALRECORDCODE, --病案号 ss.group_name as OPERATIONROOM, --手术室 ss.name as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT, --科室 ss.op_datetime as OPERATIONDATE, --手术时间 ss.op_doctor as OPERATIONDOCTOR, --手术医生 ss.order_name as OPERATIONNAME --手术名称 from dbo.view_supply_patient_info br left join dbo.view_supply_op_info ss on br.patient_id=ss.patient_id where 1=1 {0}

/*--病人挂号信息--*/ select br.PatientCode, --病人编号 br.PatientName, --姓名 br.MedicalRecordCode, --病历号 br.PatientSex, --性别 convert(datetime,br.PatientBirthday,120) as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 year(getdate())-substring(br.PatientBirthday,1,4) as PatientAge, --年龄 br.PatientIDCard, --身份证号 br.SocialSecurityCard, --社保卡号 br.PatientAddress, --地址 br.PatientPhone, --联系电话 br.HighRiskInfectivity, --是否具有高危
gh.RegisterCode, --挂号系统编号 gh.OutPatientEmergency, --挂号类型 convert(datetime,gh.RegisterDateTime,120) as RegisterDateTime, --挂号时间 gh.RegisterDepartment, --挂号科室 gh.RegisterNumber --挂号号 from View_Infecon_Patient br left join View_Infecon_Register gh on br.PatientCode=gh.PatientCode where 1=1 {0} order by convert(datetime,gh.RegisterDateTime,120) Desc

select --病人基本信息 br.PatientCode as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PatientName as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientName as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientSex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 convert(datetime,br.PatientBirthday,120) as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 year(getdate())-substring(br.PatientBirthday,1,4) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 gh.RegisterCode as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 gh.OutPatientEmergency as OUTPATIENTEMERGENCY,--挂号类型 convert(datetime,gh.RegisterDateTime,120) as REGISTERDATETIME, --挂号时间 gh.RegisterNumber as REGISTERNUMBER --挂号序号 from View_Infecon_Patient br left join View_Infecon_Register gh on br.PatientCode=gh.PatientCode where 1=1 {0} order by convert(datetime,gh.RegisterDateTime,120) Desc
/*--根据工号查询登录人员信息--*/ select name from view_supply_employee where emp_sn=@emp_sn
